markdown:
| icon           = poe2 lichen_tablets_icon.png
| description    = This clay-like unguent smells of lilac and chalk. When applied to the wrists and hands, it both steadies and quickens the body and mind, making subtle or delicate tasks simpler. Though there exist myriad legitimate uses for this concoction, its association with the criminal element tarnishes its reputation across Eora.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Quick item
| item_type      = Unguent
| item_category  = Consumable

| shop_value     = 575
| keywords       = Unguents

| recovery_time  = 3.0

| noise_impact   = Quiet

| range          =

| location       = * [Vilario's Rest](/vilariosRest/): In the Caed Nua crate, assuming you saved it and not your crew member during the prologue.
* [Periki's Overlook](/perikisOverlook/): Sold by [Fassina](/fassina/) in [The Dark Cupboard](/theDarkCupboard/).
* [The Gullet](/theGullet/), [Delver's Row](/delversRow/): Sold by [Enarat](/enarat/).
* [Delver's Row](/delversRow/): Sold by [The Spindle Man](/theSpindleMan/).
| guid           =2885d16e-e216-49e4-bfad-51a242e92343
